item.title: Full litter bin, 4th October
item.description:
Yet again this main bin was not changed on Thursday's routine bin change. It is the most used yet continually gets missed. I've since added a red litter bag for collection. Top of Hucclecote Road at us stop & junction of lights with Glos Biz Park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pointed trees Park Street just as turned in on your left, 4th October
item.description:
I have report this same trees around Richmond Sainsbury's in 2023. Nothing change about the safety of the environment. None care all the areas countrie in the UK is working in the same order. You understand kids playing out if only doing your jobs. Not report to the police are vote to the house of parliament. Cannot allowed underage out in public without someone over 18 as family members. Not working for the Emergency Service secured on open fields bush playground. What time you finished work but blame the Emergency to open 24/7 how many jobs your service wants to keep them? Please secure the bushes look for all trespass hiding putting up tents out of sight. Understand why they living that way. We wants all the big trees cut down an make equal boundary on half an half take ideas on the pavement inside the road over the next pavement look In between the line markers. that is how all the fences meant to be separate nothing hanging

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Park Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Door 57, 4th October
item.description:
Please this is serious got to confronted the resident or the landlord. Look at that before any accident i send out the warning to be aware. How would this matter be resolved if resident blaming the Council got to call report. Some signs of threats the Council with Indian pakistan showing to increase bills rent using faults. They blame Government no confession in the emergency service.Cannot call police so Indian pakistan take advantage. Take over phone contract dealership finance. An use Rishi Sunak as they Prime Minister gets them in government businesses Please sort out this matter urgent eyes do not sell at shop

item.title: Three potholes near the riding school area, 3rd October
item.description:
Residents are asking if we are going to fix the 3 large potholes on New Road whilst Severn Trent close the road to repair the burst water main. 3rd to 8th October. The three pots were reported on FixMyStreet last month there is a lot of local concern. You can't miss them as they are getting bigger every day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 3rd October
